mapper.select: SELECT a.priority, a.id,a.project_id,a.task_pid,a.task_path,a.task_level,a.task_name,a.task_remark, a.task_type,a.is_operater_task, a.start_time, a.end_time,a.company_id,company.company_name, a.org_id as depart_id,c.depart_name,a.seq,a.completion, (select COUNT(1) from maoding_web_project_task t where t.task_pid = a.id and t.task_status='0') as is_has_child, (SELECT task_level FROM maoding_web_project_task WHERE project_id = #{projectId} and POSITION( id IN a.task_path ) AND is_operater_task = 0 AND (task_type = 2 OR task_type = 1) LIMIT 1) AS task_level_status, if((select count(1) from maoding_web_project_process_time where target_id = if(t3.id is null ,a.id,t3.id) and company_id = #{companyId} )>1,true,false) as is_change_time from maoding_web_project_task a INNER JOIN maoding_web_project_task b on a.project_id = b.project_id inner join maoding_web_company company on a.company_id = company.id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_depart c on a.org_id = c.id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_project_task t3 on a.id = t3.be_modify_id and t3.from_company_id = #{companyId} where a.project_id= #{projectId} AND b.is_operater_task = 0 AND (b.task_type = 0 or b.task_type = 1 or b.task_type = 2 or b.task_type = 5) and b.task_status != 1 and b.company_id = #{companyId} and POSITION(a.id IN b.task_path) group by a.id ORDER BY a.task_level,a.seq
